original_text: And he began to teach them, that the Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders, and of the chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and after three days rise again.
korean_text: 인자가 많은 고난을 받고 장로들과 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 버린 바 되어 죽임을 당하고 사흘 만에 살아나야 할 것을 비로소 그들에게 가르치시되

sentences.original_text: And he began to teach them
that the Son of man must suffer many things
sentences.korean_translation: 인자가 많은 고난을 받아야 할 것을

sentences.original_text: and be rejected of the elders
and after three days rise again
